name: Payroll Report
query:
select
    ss.employee,
    emp.employee_name,
    emp.department,
    emp.custom_job_family,
    emp.grade,
    emp.custom_directorate,
    emp.designation,
    e1.amount as e1,
    e2.amount as e2,
    e3.amount as e3,
    e4.amount as e4,
    e5.amount as e5,
    e6.amount as e6,
    e7.amount as e7,
    d1.amount as d1,
    d2.amount as d2,
    d3.amount as d3,
    d4.amount as d4,
    d5.amount as d5,
    d6.amount as d6,
    ss.net_pay,
    pvd_com.amount as pvd_com,
    ss.gross_pay,
    ss.total_deduction,
    gd.custom_min,
    gd.custom_max,
    (e1.amount-gd.custom_min)/(gd.custom_max-gd.custom_min)*100 as percentile,
    ss.posting_date

from `tabSalary Slip` ss
join `tabEmployee` emp on ss.employee = emp.name
join `tabEmployee Grade` gd on gd.name = emp.grade
-- -------------------------------------------------------------
-- e1 = เงินเดือน
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e1 on e1.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e1.parent = ss.name and e1.salary_component = 'เงินเดือน'
-- e2 = เงินชดเชย 1
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e2 on e2.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e2.parent = ss.name and e2.salary_component = 'เงินชดเชย 1'
-- e3 = เงินชดเชย 2
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e3 on e3.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e3.parent = e3.name and e3.salary_component = 'เงินชดเชย 2'
-- e4 = ประโยชน์ตอบแทนอื่น
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e4 on e4.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e4.parent = ss.name and e4.salary_component = 'ประโยชน์ตอบแทนอื่น'
-- e5 = เงินเพิ่มพิเศษ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e5 on e5.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e5.parent = ss.name and e5.salary_component = 'เงินเพิ่มพิเศษ'
-- e6 = ตกเบิก
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e6 on e6.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e6.parent = ss.name and e6.salary_component = 'ตกเบิก'
-- e7 = เงินได้อื่นก่อนภาษี
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` e7 on e7.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and e7.parent = ss.name and e7.salary_component = 'เงินได้อื่นก่อนภาษี'
-- ------------------------------------------------------------------
-- d1 = ภาษี
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d1 on d1.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d1.parent = ss.name and d1.salary_component = 'ภาษี'
-- d2 = กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d2 on d2.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d2.parent = ss.name and d2.salary_component = 'กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ'
-- d3 = สหกรณ์ออมทรัพย์ วท.
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d3 on d3.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d3.parent = ss.name and d3.salary_component = 'สหกรณ์ออมทรัพย์ วท.'
-- d4 = ธนาคารอาคารสงเคราะห์
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d4 on d4.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d4.parent = ss.name and d4.salary_component = 'ธนาคารอาคารสงเคราะห์'
-- d5 = กยศ.
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d5 on d1.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d5.parent = ss.name and d5.salary_component = 'กยศ.'
-- d6 = เงินหักอื่นๆ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` d6 on d6.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and d6.parent = ss.name and d6.salary_component = 'เงินหักอื่นๆ'
-- ------------------------------------------------------------------
-- pvd_com = กองทุนบริษัทสมทบ
left outer join `tabSalary Detail` pvd_com on pvd_com.parenttype = 'Salary Slip'
and pvd_com.parent = ss.name and pvd_com.salary_component = 'กองทุนบริษัทสมทบ'

where ss.docstatus = %(docstatus)s
and ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s and end_date <= %(to_date)s
and ss.company = %(company)s
